law.text: The word "person" wherever used in KRS 418.040 to 418.090, shall be construed to mean any person, partnership, joint stock company, incorporated association, or society, or municipal or other corporation of any character whatsoever.
law.history: Transferred 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 84, sec. 1, effective July 1, 1953, from C.C. sec. 639a-11. -- Created 1922 Ky. Acts ch. 83, sec. 11.
